Specific to General Symptoms/Diagnosis.text: A CT scan revealed a pancreatic mass.

Specific to General Medicinal Instructio.text: Adjusted to include calcium carbonate, Creon, lorazepam, metoclopramide, olanzapine, omeprazole, oxycodone SR, polyethylene glycol, and continued most of the admission medications with adjustments.

Chronological Inconsistency.text: Symptoms persisted, leading to her current admission.
Chronological Inconsistency.explanation: The summary does not mention that the patient was initially admitted to another facility before presenting to the ED again. This omission leads to an incomplete sequence of events.
